channel.title: interview on RamblingWare
channel.description: Recent content in interview on RamblingWare

item.title: Continuous Learning at Work
item.description: I’ve been doing job interviews as of late and one question that keeps cropping up is about managing staff. What would you do if you were a technical manager? What would you do to improve your team and/or company? I’d have my folks continuously learn new skills every year. Before I dive into my reasoning I want to preface that IBM has an internal program specifically for this.

item.title: Shortest FizzBuzz Solution in Java?
item.description: Count from 1 to 100, and follow these rules: - Print "Fizz" if the number is divisible by 3 - Print "Buzz" if the number is divisible by 5 - Print "FizzBuzz" if the number is divisible by 3 and 5 FizzBuzz: A fun interview question to ask any programmer, in just about any language It would seem like there are only a few solutions, but in reality, there are all kinds of approaches to solve this coding question.
